actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the manufacture, sale, purchase, transfer, receipt, or transportation of handguns and handgun ammunition, in or affecting interstate and foreign commerce, except for, to, or by, certain pistol clubs, law enforcement officers, and members of the military.
short_title: Handgun and Handgun Ammunition Control Act

summary.text: Handgun and Handgun Ammunition Control Act - Prohibits the manufacture, sale, purchase, transfer, receipt, or transportation of handguns and handgun ammunition, in or affecting interstate and foreign commerce, except for, to, or by, qualified pistol clubs, law enforcement officers, and members of the military.

titles.title: Handgun and Handgun Ammunition Control Act

A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the manufacture, sale, purchase, transfer, receipt, or transportation of handguns and handgun ammunition, in or affecting interstate and foreign commerce, except for, to, or by, certain pistol clubs, law enforcement officers, and members of the military.
